            EARTHQUAKE ROOF STRUCTURE PROJECT (COOPERAT,TF058077-BANK PROJECT APPRAISAL AND

abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Yogyakarta and
            Central Java Earthquake Roof Structure Project is to respond
            to the most basic needs of the households affected by the
            earthquake through the provision of roof structures that
            transition to permanent housing. The Project will provide
            eligible families in targeted villages in the affected areas
            with safe and durable housing through the provision of roof
            structures while permanent house is being rebuilt. The
            Project provides the eligible beneficiaries an 18
